page.title: 22Light industry in Binstead October 2011
page.content:
Of the four businesses mentioned in the 1986 article, only one (Clark Masts) is still trading.

Island Bakeries, Columbia Products and Osborne Electronics have all closed down and their premises demolished; now houses and flats have been built where the bakery and factories used to stand.

I may be wrong, but as far as I am aware, no other new businesses have started up in their place, which could explain why in 2011 job opportunities are so scarce.
